mapper.select: select * from place_info order by place_no

select place_no, place_name, place_img, place_tel, place_open, place_price, place_row, place_col, place_addr, place_type, place_detail from (select rownum r, place_no, place_name, place_img, place_tel, place_open, place_price, place_row, place_col, place_addr, place_type, place_detail from (select * from place_info where place_type = #{type} order by place_no)) where r between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from place_info where place_type = #{place_type}
